content.html: I’ve given a lot of grief to people who work at Facebook / Meta for the past year or so. I’m not going to do that anymore, and for what it’s worth I’m sorry. You deserve better than my shitty comments.
content.value:
I’ve given a lot of grief to people who work at Facebook / Meta for the past year or so. 

I’m not going to do that anymore, and for what it’s worth I’m sorry. You deserve better than my shitty comments.
